document_data.name: Marrakt
document_data.Activities: An orc without a tribe, Marrakt acted as a lackey and messenger for Constable [[Tren Noemfor]].
document_data.History: In 1367 DR, Constable Tren sent Marrakt escorted by two mercenaries to invite a just-arrived-in-town adventuring party to meet him.
document_data.Personality: Marrakt did not want to be part of any fight; at the first sign of trouble, he escaped.
